table.title: Web Activity Summary
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-wsa-squid cs_username="$cs_username$" src_ip="$c_ip$" usage="$usage$" | eval mb = (bytes_in + bytes_out) / (1024 * 1024) | eval action = upper(substr(x_acltag,0,5)) | eval isBlocked = if(action == "BLOCK", 1, 0) | table _time, cs_username, src_ip, cs_url_host, x_webcat_code_full, usage, action, isBlocked | rename cs_username as "Username", src_ip as "IP Address", cs_url_host as "Website" | rename x_webcat_code_full as "Category", usage as "Usage", action as "Action", isBlocked as "Blocked" | addcoltotals
